name: From Within Hoodie - Dark Blue
description:
75% OFF
$17.00 (reg. $68)
ONLINE EXCLUSIVE

The collection and this piece specifically drew inspiration from a quote by Elisabeth Kübler-Ross who was a humanitarian and psychiatrist who focused on lives of people in near death situations.
“People are like stained-glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.” - Elisabeth Kübler-Ross

• Dark Blue
• Made in USA
• Soft as a unicorn's mane
• 50% Cotton / 50% Polyester
• Sizing: Size 1 is a Women's Small/Men's XS

name: Storyteller's Hoody - Orchid
description:
75% OFF
$17 (reg. $68)
ONLINE EXCLUSIVE

TMOOH is a community of people who share their stories of triumph and struggles with body image, self-image, and self-worth issues. Their stories empower and inspire others who are enduring similar struggles. On this shirt is a quote that summarizes this idea.
“Each of us holds a powerful story. Let us all be storytellers and change lives through sharing the stories that are written inside our hearts."

• Orchid
• Made in USA
• Soft as a unicorn's mane
• 50% Cotton / 50% Polyester
• Sizing: Size 1 is a Women's Small/Men's XS
